      CASE defeated IS
      WHEN '0' => Alien_Color <= dout;
      WHEN '1' => Alien_Color <= din1;
      WHEN OTHERS => Alien_Color <= (OTHERS => 'X');
      END CASE;
   END PROCESS u_6combo_proc;
